original_title: Tumshie McFadgen's Bid for Ultimate Bliss
overview: Tumshie McFadgen is a sensualist, his trouble starts when he comes up with the notion of cross-pleasuring. what would it be like to experience the maximum whoopee in all five senses at the same time? well I can tell you, it was a bloody disaster all round.
title: Tumshie McFadgen's Bid for Ultimate Bliss
